item.description:
Let's get out and see some local Improv

Kitsch in Sync is a short form troupe meaning they perforn short, unrelated scenes and vignettes are performed, each one inspired by a different audience input. In most cases these scenes last 5 minutes or less. This is the type of improv fans of the TV show "Whose Line is it Anyway?" will recognize.

Brookline Puppet Showplace Theatre
32 Station Street
Brookline, MA 02445
Brookline Village stop, D Line
(directions)

Friday August 3rd, 8pm
$10 / $7 students

The show starts at 8, let's meet there by 7:45
item.name: Let's get out and See some local improvisers
